page.title: 02Shops in Duffield
page.content: There are quite a lot of small shops in {Duffield }such as {dress shops, {food shops }etc.. Here is a list of all the different ships in Duffield. {4 dress shops,}Peta Jordan, Pat Smith, Browsing and Butterflies. {2 greengrocers, }Fretwells, Pippin. {1 chemist,}James. {5 grocers,}Coop, Mace, Burtons, Oak Stores and Chevin Stores. {3 hairdressers,}Scissors,Hairline,Pams {1 Post Office }(and Cake Decorating Supplies). {1 do-it-yourself and pets. {3 restaurants or cafes,}Duvelle, Golden Dragon and Welcome Cafe. {3 butchers, }Bestwick, Lomas, Coates. {1 fishmonger, }Goodwin. {1 off licence,}Cellar Five. {2 newsagents, }Cloughs, Wests. {1 cloth shop, }The Cloth Shop. {1 coal merchants, }Uptons.
